name: The Fire
description:
Our forests are burning.
Turkey is burning from south to north. People have lost their homes, their farms, and their animals. They lost all their life savings…We all lost our trees, animals, and our beautiful nature.
Our hearts are burning, the hatred and cruelty are suffocating.
Everyone who got affected by the fire, we are so sorry to say; this is all the collective mistake that we could have prevented. We could have been more prepared. We are so deeply sorry that we created a human hegemony that was so cruel to all living/non-living organisms and all habitats. We are so deeply sorry that we couldn’t even manage to restrain our kind. We are so deeply sorry for everything we have caused. And from the bottoms of our hearts, we wish collective healing for us all.

All the sales of the artwork will be donated to HAYTAP Animal Rights Federation.
